structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: List Of Jurors To Prisoners; Process For Witnesses
law.text: A prisoner indicted for a crime punishable with death or imprisonment for life, upon demand by him or his counsel upon the clerk, shall have a list of the jurors who have been returned and process to summon witnesses who are necessary to his defence, at the expense of the commonwealth.
